de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder

Class AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder<DialogType extends ScrollableDialog,BuilderType extends AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder<DialogType,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractMaterialDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractHeaderDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
          • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractAnimateableDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
            • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractValidateableDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
              • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractButtonBarDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
                • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractListDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
                  • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
  • Type Parameters:
    DialogType - The type of the dialog, which is created by the builder
    BuilderType - The type of the builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaterialDialog.Builder

    public abstract class AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder<DialogType extends ScrollableDialog,BuilderType extends AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder<DialogType,?>>
extends AbstractListDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
    An abstract base class for all builders, which allow to create and show dialogs, which are designed according to Android Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.
    Since:
    3.6.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create dialogs, which allow to create and show dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.
      AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder(android.content.Context context, int themeResourceId)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create dialogs, which allow to create and show dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.

      protected void obtainStyledAttributes(int themeResourceId)
      Obtains all relevant attributes from the current theme.
      BuilderType showDividersOnScroll(boolean show)
      Sets, whether dividers, which are located above and below the list view of the dialog, which is created by the builder, should be shown, when the list view is scrolled, or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder

        public AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder(@NonNull
                                       android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new builder, which allows to create dialogs, which allow to create and show dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the builder, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

      • AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder

        public AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder(@NonNull
                                       android.content.Context context,
                                       @StyleRes
                                       int themeResourceId)
        Creates a new builder, which allows to create dialogs, which allow to create and show dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the builder, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        themeResourceId - The resource id of the theme, which should be used by the dialog, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid theme

    • Method Detail

      • showDividersOnScroll

        public final BuilderType showDividersOnScroll(boolean show)
        Sets, whether dividers, which are located above and below the list view of the dialog, which is created by the builder, should be shown, when the list view is scrolled, or not.
        Parameters:
        show - True, if the dividers, which are located above and below the dialog's list view, should be shown, when the list view is scrolled, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The builder, the method has been called upon, as an instance of the generic type BuilderType

      • obtainStyledAttributes

        @CallSuper
protected void obtainStyledAttributes(@StyleRes
                                                 int themeResourceId)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMaterialDialogBuilder
        Obtains all relevant attributes from the current theme.

        obtainStyledAttributes in class AbstractListDialogBuilder<DialogType extends ScrollableDialog,BuilderType extends AbstractScrollableDialogBuilder<DialogType,?>>
        Parameters:
        themeResourceId - The resource id of the theme, which should be used by the dialog, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid style resource
